data.title: Full List of China Dialing Codes - Country Calling Code
data.meta_description: Find all phone codes for China. Complete list of China dialing codes and more information on international calls to China.
data.text:
China Country Phone Code: +86

We want to make sure that staying connected to loved ones in China is as easy as possible. So, we’ve put together a guide on how to call China for you.

Here is everything you should know about China area codes and the localities/regions they serve.

LOCAL TIME TIME ZONE

Tuesday, August 27, 2024

Beijing UTC+08:00 HOURS DAYLIGHT SAVING TIME Not In DST WEATHER DIFFERENCE

23.6°C

ClearSky 20.1/32.7°C

Beijing, China is 3 hours ahead of you (8:58:46 PM)

How to Call China?

Calling China does not have to be complicated. To call China, follow these three simple steps:

Begin by dialing the exit country code.

Now dial the China country code: +86 along with the area code you want to call in.

Lastly, dial the recipient’s number.

Dialing Instructions

Follow these dialing instructions to call loved ones.

Dial the International Direct Dialing (IDD) number. Countries have different numbers, or may have more than one IDD, depending on the carrier or type of service.

Dial the Country Code. In some cases, the country code is shared among countries. For example, the United States, Canada, and much of the Caribbean and Guam use country code 1.

Dial the city/area code (if any) for the number you are dialing. Smaller countries may not use city codes or area codes, while larger countries have hundreds of them.

Dial the phone number you are calling.

00

+86

---

-------

IDD

Country Code

City Code

Phone Number
